name: Space Sweeper (Alessio Bendoni)
description:
Year 3542:

Humanity has explored and conquered the most hidden corners of the galaxy.

Spatial exploration has had high cost for humanity, both financially and in people and the monetary crisis has led humanity to the brink of collapse.

But a new job has born, made to rebalance the fate of the human race and whole galaxy.

THE SPACE SWEEPER

Video Gameplay

Controls:

WASD-QE: move character in 6 directions.

R: Transfer Kinectic Energy to ship to stop.

Platform: Web, Windows PC

Engine: Unity

Language: C#

Team size: 1
